sys_update_version.name: sys_transform_entry_ab4747f58743dd1093264085dabb3567
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_transform_entry"><sys_transform_entry action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><choice_action>ignore</choice_action><coalesce>false</coalesce><coalesce_case_sensitive>false</coalesce_case_sensitive><coalesce_empty_fields>false</coalesce_empty_fields><date_format>yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss</date_format><map display_value="Transform Suppliers">e135c7758743dd1093264085dabb3589</map><reference_value_field>sys_id</reference_value_field><source_field>[Script]</source_field><source_script><![CDATA[answer = (function transformEntry(source) {

    var gr_entity = new GlideRecord("sn_fin_purchasing_entity");
    gr_entity.addQuery('erp_number', source.purchasing_organization);
    gr_entity.addQuery('erp_source', source.erp_source);
    gr_entity.query();
    if (gr_entity.next()) {
        if (!gs.nil(target.purchasing_entities)) {
            var listArr = target.purchasing_entities.toString().split(',');
            var presentValue = gr_entity.getUniqueValue().toString();
            if (listArr.indexOf(presentValue) == -1) {
                listArr.push(gr_entity.getUniqueValue().toString());
            }
            return listArr.join(',');
        } else {
            return gr_entity.getUniqueValue();
        }
    }

})(source);]]></source_script><source_table>sn_sap_data_int_supplier_stg</source_table><sys_class_name>sys_transform_entry</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>Prama</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-11-09 20:02:44</sys_created_on><sys_id>ab4747f58743dd1093264085dabb3567</sys_id><sys_mod_count>12</sys_mod_count><sys_name>[Script]</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Primary Data Integration with SAP" source="sn_sap_data_int">93c7f5cb875a1950fd73642d0ebb3590</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Primary Data Integration with SAP">93c7f5cb875a1950fd73642d0ebb3590</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_transform_entry_ab4747f58743dd1093264085dabb3567</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>Varun</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-04-28 11:32:16</sys_updated_on><target_field>purchasing_entities</target_field><target_table>sn_fin_supplier</target_table><use_source_script>true</use_source_script></sys_transform_entry></record_update>
